content.rendered:
HEALTH AND SAFETY

TRAINING COURSES

Click Here for a Free Quotation

Health and Safety Training Courses

Keeping People Safe and Compliant...

Plant and Safety Limited are industry experts and specialists in providing a wide range of Health and Safety Training Courses. 

All of our Health and Safety training courses are available to both novice and experienced personnel, and are designed to provide the necessary knowledge, skills, and qualifications to allow a person to work at height and operate equipment at height safely and effectively within the work place. 

As a national training provider, we strive to provide the best service, advice, and support possible. We also understand that training can be a challenge for companies to co-ordinate , which is why all of our training courses can be delivered at your own premises using your own equipment. This provides a more flexible, cost effective, and tailored training solution for your business. 

Plant and Safety are proud to employ highly experienced and qualified trainers certified and accredited by industry recognised bodies as NPORS, RTITB, and ITSSAR. 

Health and Safety Awareness Training Course

Course Objective:

To provide personnel with a practical summary of Health and Safety within the work place, along with the legal requirements of employers and employees as defined by the Health and Safety at Work Act 1974. This Health and Safety Awareness training course is designed for both new/ novice and experienced personnel. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Safe Working at Height Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach people how to Work at Height safely and effectively within the work place. This Safe Working at Height training course is designed for both new/ novice and experienced personnel. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Harness and Fall Arrest Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach operators working at height how to operate and use a Harness and Fall Arrest system safely and effectively within the work place. This Harness and Fall Arrest training course is designed for both new/ novice and experienced operators. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Safe Use of Ladders Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach operators how to operate and use Ladders safely and effectively within the work place. This Safe Use of Ladders training course is designed for both new/ novice and experienced operators. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Manual Handling Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach personnel the principles and practices of safe manual handling within the work place, as defined by the Manual Handling Operations Regulations 1992 (MHOR). This Manual Handling training course is designed for both new/ novice and experienced personnel. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Vehicle Marshal Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach any person who is involved in the movement of vehicles, covering health and safety and practical lessons on how to move a vehicle in a safe manner. 

This Vehicle Marshall training course is designed for both new/ novice and experienced personnel. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Plant Machinery Marshal Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach any person who is involved in the movement of plant machinery, covering health and safety and practical lessons on how to move plant machinery in a safe manner. 

This Plant Machinery Marshall training course is designed for both new/ novice and experienced personnel. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

S001 NPORS Site Safety Awareness Training Course

Course Objective:

This training course highlights potential hazards when working on site and provides practical advice on keeping yourself and your colleagues safe. It also covers your individual and employers responsibilities, including what you can do if you think anyone’s health and safety is being put at risk. This S001 NPORS Site Safety Awareness training course is endorsed by Build UK as standard training for all operatives on site, and is designed for both new/novice and experienced operatives. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

First Aid at Work Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach First Aid at Work and the comprehensive set of skills needed by first aiders in most workplaces to become a confident first aider at work. Giving both the ability and knowledge to deal with first aid emergencies.  This First Aid at Work training course is designed for both new/novice and experienced first aiders. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Emergency First Aid at Work Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach Emergency First Aid at Work by providing the necessary skills and knowledge to meet your regularity requirements, if your company risk assessment indicates that first aid training covering emergency protocols only is sufficient. This Emergency First Aid at Work training course is designed for both new/ novice and experienced first aiders. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

WHY CHOOSE PLANT AND SAFETY?


Industry Experts

Our team has extensive experience in providing Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services across all sectors within the UK. Our team of passionate industry experts work closely with our customers to keep their equipment and their people both safe and compliant


Quality Assurance

All of our services are backed by an extensive list of nationally recognised Accreditations and Industry Body Memberships. Our Accreditations and Memberships include ISO 9001, ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001, NPORS, CHAS, Safecontractor, Safe PQQ, ROSPA, and the British Safety Council


National Service Provider

Plant and Safety are a national provider of Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services. Our national team of highly qualified, experienced, and competent trainers and engineers work closely with our customers to keep equipment and people both safe and compliant


Online Inspection Database

All of our Testing, Inspection, and Certification customers are automatically granted with access to our online inspection database to download examination reports for any equipment certified by Plant and Safety. Our inspection database runs on the industry leading ‘Motion Kinetic’ software



Get a Free Quote for Your Health and Safety

Training Course Today

ACCREDITATIONS & MEMBERSHIPS

Plant and Safety Limited CHAS Accreditation
Plant and Safety Limited British Safety Council Membership
Plant and Safety Limited ROSPA Membership
Plant and Safety Limited NPORS Approved and Accredited Training Provider

Plant and Safety Limited CHAS Premium Plus Accreditation
Plant and Safety Safecontractor and SafePQQ Accreditation

CONTACT PLANT AND SAFETY LIMITED

T: 0330 113 7920

E: sales@plantandsafety.co.uk

Plant and Safety Ltd, Birmingham Road, Shenstone, Staffordshire, WS14 0LB
